name: Ipsos Mobile
description: PLEASE NOTE: You need to have been specifically invited to a mobile app survey for which you will be provided a different user ID/Password than your regular online login to participate. It is not possible to access your online account through this app.   The Ipsos Mobile app is the mobile research app from Ipsos, an independent market research company controlled and managed by research professionals. Ipsos researchers assess market potential and interpret market trends. They develop and build brands. They help clients build long-term relationships with their customers. They test advertising and study audience responses to various media and they measure public opinion around the globe. We ask the right questions, i.e. those that enable the people we interview to express their opinions, desires and expectations. Mobile devices are indispensable, keeping people connected to the world 24/7. The Ipsos Mobile app allows you to respond to short questionnaires at any time, answering questions and providing images, videos and location information  providing your feedback at the exact point of experience, in context and in the moment. Mobile Research enriches our understanding of people in a more immediate manner than any other research method and the Ipsos Mobile app makes it possible.  When you open the Ipsos Mobile app you will be asked to login with your specific login to a specific survey. When the app opens you will see the specific survey available to you as well as several demo surveys for you to take part in. Simply click the survey you wish to take. Navigation through the survey is simple and easy.  Join the world of mobile research through the Ipsos Mobile app.
